# The sysvshm extension

This extension provides the System V shared memory support.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_SYSVSHM

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_SYSVSHM_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
